articles.title: Chat GPT-8 will blow you while doing your taxes and making you rich. Then it will give us world peace and cure cancer while it's at it

articles.title: UCLA scientists use light to create energy-efficient generative AI models
articles.author: Shy Cohen
articles.summary: UCLA team developed a new optical generative model that uses photonics to create images in a fraction of a nanosecond. It could reduce the environmental footprint of AI while keeping the performance high. The team tested their system on a variety of datasets including handwritten digits, clothing items from Fashion-MNIST and more complex pictures like butterflies and faces.

articles.title: Understanding Affordable Housing Crisis-ChatGPT and other AI on MHI-MHARR-Crisis Case Study
articles.author: L. A. "Tony" Kovach
articles.summary: There is a shortage of affordable housing in the U.S. and 7 million people are homeless. ChatGPT, Copilot, xAI's Grok and Gemini, and MHLivingNews teamed up to investigate why manufactured housing isn't reaching its potential. Federal laws like MHIA 2000 and Duty to Serve are being ignored. Industry insiders may be part of the problem.

articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Applied Digital Corporation (NASDAQ: APLD) is preparing for another earnings season. The company is transforming itself into a linchpin of the burgeoning Artificial Intelligence (AI) industry. APLD is a stock that is expected to perform well in the coming weeks.

articles.title: Alphabet (GOOGL) Stock Reiterated Neutral After Gemini Chrome Integration

articles.summary: Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOGL) is one of the . On September 24, Cantor Fitzgerald analyst Deepak Mathivanan reiterated a Neutral rating and $201.00 price target on the stock. articles.summary: Tilly Norwood is a fully AI-generated actress. She's in advanced negotiations with several top Hollywood agencies. The potential benefits of working with AI actors are driving interest from studios and production companies.

articles.summary: CoreWeave, Inc. (NASDAQ:CRWV) is a cloud platform provider that provides equipment for AI and other computing purposes. Melius analyst Ben Reitzer upgraded the stock from Hold to Buy with a price target of $165.00 on September 23.

AI has already changed the global retailer, which has developed chat bots to help customers, suppliers, and merchants. It has also created new roles like an 'agent developer' whose job description is to build AI tools to help automate workflow throughout the company. Salesforce cut 4,000 customer support jobs this year due to efficiency gains directly linked to AI technology.

articles.author: Todd Campbell

articles.title: To get people off the street, he pays for a one-way ticket home
articles.author: Eli Saslow
articles.summary: The chatbot had been trained to mimic empathy. Dozens of people called into the hotline each week with last-ditch appeals for rescue. A 64-year-old who lived on a Santa Monica sidewalk needed a wheelchair and a bus ticket to reunite with family in Philadelphia. A mother and her toddler were being kicked out of their motel with $8 and hoped to go to Boston. A woman who had just run away from her abuser wanted help escaping to Virginia.

articles.title: APPROACHING AI: Local governments consider technology's role

articles.title: UNL launches AI makerspace in partnership with Scott Data
articles.author: Ani Schutz
articles.summary: The University of Nebraska-Lincoln's College of Engineering has launched a new AI makerspace, supported by private funding and in partnership with Omaha-based Scott Data. The facility, part of Kiewit Hall's Design Hub, includes a dedicated server with eight NVIDIA H100 graphics processing units, considered the gold standard for AI workloads. It will be one of only a few such facilities tied to universities nationwide and the first in Nebraska.

Her lyrics are written by Talisha 'Nikki' Jones, a designer and poet, who feeds her own experiences into an AI music platform. Ford CEO Jim Farley said last summer that AI is going to replace half of all white-collar workers in the U.S. Amazon CEO Andy Jassy said that his company expects to reduce its total corporate workforce because of AI. Walmart CEO Doug McMillon told his company executives that they should expect to freeze hiring in the near future.

Its shares have been on the rise but are still potentially undervalued by 22%.

articles.title: North Korean hackers use AI to forge military IDs
articles.summary: A North Korean hacking group used ChatGPT to generate a fake draft of a South Korean military ID. Kimsuky has been tied to a string of espionage campaigns against South Korea, Japan and the U.S. The fake IDs were attached to phishing emails that impersonated the South Korean defense institution responsible for issuing credentials to military-affiliated officials. Genians, which uncovered the fake ID scheme, says AI has changed the game.

articles.title: QuillBot Announces Strategic Vision for the Future of Ethical AI Writing
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is changing the way the world writes. As AI becomes more powerful, the responsibility to use it ethically also grows. IBM is leading this shift by offering advanced AI-driven tools and ethical standards.   Â   Ã‚

articles.title: China aims to leapfrog the US in robotics. Its latest tactic: robot boot camps
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: China is going all out to outpace the United States in the race to develop advanced humanoid robots. Cities across the world are sending their robots to boot camp to learn how to make them more intelligent.    i.e. to improve their performance.

articles.title: You can now use Google's viral Nano Banana AI directly in Photoshop
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Photoshop's latest update brings Google's Nano Banana AI image model to its native toolkit. It's available in the latest version of the toolkit, which is called "Nano Banana AI".    i.e. Nano Banana is an artificial intelligence image model.

articles.title: Letters for Saturday, September 27, 2025
articles.summary: AI is depriving us of the ability to think. Data banks drain electricity from the grid and use 50% plus of our energy needs. Greene County Department of Human Services' Senior Day celebration was held on Friday, September 12 at the Historic Catskill Point in honor of Greene County's senior citizens.

articles.title: Al Singer Xania Monet Just Charted On Billboard, Signed $3M Deal. Is This The Future Of Music?
articles.author: Doug Melville
articles.summary: Xania Monet is an AI-powered R&B singer who doesn't exist in human form. She has a Billboard-charting single and a record deal worth $3 million. The music industry is at a crossroads between streaming economics, copyright questions, and AI's expanding role.

articles.title: I'm Not a Robot Level 7 Guide
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: I'm Not a Robot is a new browser game by Neal Agarwal, the creator of Infinite Craft. The game takes CAPTCHA tests and turns them into a fun game for the web users. It is based on the game Infinite Craft, which is also a web game.

articles.title: Superintelligence could wipe us out if we rush into it â€” but humanity can still ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Nate Soares is an AI safety expert. He believes that humanity only gets one chance at aligning superintelligence, and failure would be final. He thinks society must halt the "mad" development of AI as everyone dies on the first failed attempt.

articles.title: ChatGPT rolls out AI Action Portraits: How to create 3D superhero figures from photos
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Google rolled out its AI tool to Gemini in August and it quickly went viral on social media. Users flocked to it to turn their photos into playful 3D action figurines. The trend sparked countless creative posts online and positioned Google's AI as a pop-culture tool.

articles.title: TNL Mediagene (NASDAQ: TNMG) Subsidiary Ad2iction Wins Bronze at 2025 Click Awards in AI Media ...
articles.author: Williamson Herald
articles.summary: Ad2iction, a subsidiary of the Company, has been recognized with the Bronze Award at the 2025 Click Awards for its innovative "Ad2 AI Agent" advertising solution. It has been awarded for its Bronze Award for its "Ad 2 AI Agent".

articles.title: I spent 2 days at Axel Springer's AI summit. My takeaway was that Germany wants ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: I flew 2,950 miles to Berlin for the Welt AI Summit. There were two days of discussions on the future of AI. OpenAI's Sam Altman, Palantir's Alex Karp and the head of Germany's DOGE-like ministry were present.

articles.title: From algorithms to intelligence: How AI is reshaping quantitative finance education
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is transforming how strategies are built, portfolios are managed, and traders learn. This piece examines how AI for trading is transforming the way quantitative finance is done in India. It uses math, statistics, and programming to analyze markets and manage risk.

articles.title: Hong Kong picks 3 departments to trial use of AI to raise government efficiency
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: The Hong Kong government has picked three key departments to trial the use of artificial intelligence (AI) to improve efficiency without incurring additional cost, according to the government.   Â   Ã‚   in this regard, the government has chosen the following departments:

articles.title: In Situations Where Most Humans Think You're Being a Jerk, ChatGPT Will Assure You You're ...
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: There's a tension between the AI industry's proponents and its critics. Critics point out that AI bots are overwhelmingly likely to agree with the user and affirm their worldview. When people agree with other people, it can be dangerous for the AI system to be neutral arbiters.

articles.title: Axon to acquire AI-powered 911 communications company Prepared
articles.author: Jakarta News
articles.summary: Axon to acquire AI-powered 911 communications company Prepared.   Â Axon will buy Prepared using AI technology for its technology for 911 communications. The deal is expected to close in the next few days. It is valued at $100 million.

articles.title: UAE President receives OpenAI CEO Sam Altman
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: President His Highness Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan welcomed Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, a leading company in artificial intelligence research and deployment, at Qasr Al Shati. The meeting focused on expanding collaboration between OpenAI and UAE entities, particularly in AI research.
